plugin.name: hibernate-hijacker
plugin.author: Kim A. Betti
plugin.title: Hibernate Hijacker
plugin.description: \ This plugins are a part of the re-engineering efforts going into the Multi-Tenant plugin. It is very difficult to intercept new Hibernate sessions in a non-intrusive way. Multiple plugins trying to archive this are likely to step on each others feet. This plugin publishes intercepted Session instances to a lightweight event broker.
